text:
Has anyone found a way to get HubSpot templates to leverage browser caching? <https://cl.ly/9388fdd65590/download/Screen%20Shot%202019-06-19%20at%2012.45.43.png>

It would be ideal if HubSpot made sure that these assets, over which we have no control (we cannot set  the expiry date or maximum age in the HubSpot COS like we can on other tools or our own server), made sure these assets did not negatively affect our Google Page Speed Scores.

I think I’ve found the answer to my question. :wink:

TLDR: No it’s not possible - and also not really beneficial anyway (other than getting better google quality scores)

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/How-to-leverage-browser-caching-for-page-speed-HubSpot-won-t/td-p/14418>
